mapper.select: SELECT EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD AS spotCd /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_SPOT.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_SPOT.SPOT_NM AS spotNm /* 스팟 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_SPOT.APPLY_START_DD AS applyStartDd /* 적용 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_SPOT.APPLY_END_DD AS applyEndDd /* 적용 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_SPOT.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.URL AS url /* URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_SPOT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_SPOT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_SPOT_PK(P),SYS_C0011672(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_SPOT.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_SPOT.SPOT_NM = #{spotNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 스팟 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_SPOT.APPLY_START_DD = #{applyStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_SPOT.APPLY_END_DD = #{applyEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_SPOT.COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.URL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* URL, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_SPOT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_SPOT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD AS spotCd /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_SPOT.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_SPOT.SPOT_NM AS spotNm /* 스팟 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_SPOT.APPLY_START_DD AS applyStartDd /* 적용 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_SPOT.APPLY_END_DD AS applyEndDd /* 적용 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_SPOT.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.URL AS url /* URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_SPOT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_SPOT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_SPOT.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_SPOT.SPOT_NM = #{spotNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 스팟 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_SPOT.APPLY_START_DD = #{applyStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_SPOT.APPLY_END_DD = #{applyEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_SPOT.COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.URL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* URL, VARCHAR2(200) */
AND EZC_SPOT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_SPOT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_SPOT SET /* 스팟 */ CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,SPOT_NM = #{spotNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 스팟 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,APPLY_START_DD = #{applyStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,APPLY_END_DD = #{applyEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,URL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1 AND SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
